name: Cooking with My Man Jerome
description:
Thanks for trying out our game!

Welcome to Cooking With My Man Jerome. My Man Jerome has been stranded on a procedural generated beach which even made him question whether he might be a crab. Now that that's out of the way...

The sun is a deadly lazer and your objective is to survive and not get cooked! How? Hide in the shadows... duh. Oh, and don't forget your suncream!

MOVEMENT:

WASD 

UP, LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT

Q, E = ACTIVATE POWERUP

MORE INFO IN THE IN-GAME TUTORIAL

-Inspired by the Jerome Gambit.
